definition[0]: used to say that you would prefer to do or have something
example[0]: I’d rather have a quiet night in front of the TV.
example[1]: We could eat later if you would rather do that.
example[2]: ‘I think you’d better ask her.’ ‘I’d rather not (=I do not want to).’
example[3]: I’d rather you didn’t go out alone  (=I do not want you to go).
example[4]: I’d rather die than apologize to Helen.
